abstract: Residents of the Villa Charlotte Brontë are still waiting to move back in after Tropical Storm Irene damaged their co-op complex.
snippet: Residents of the Villa Charlotte Brontë are still waiting to move back in after Tropical Storm Irene damaged their co-op complex.
lead_paragraph: In late September, residents of 5 of the 17 apartments at the idyllic Villa Charlotte Brontë cooperative in the Bronx were waiting for permission to go home after Tropical Storm Irene caused a landslide at the building.
